thread.title: Baby One More Time? Britney Spears ‘Desperate’ For Child With Hunky Boy Toy
thread.title_full: Baby One More Time? Britney Spears ‘Desperate’ For Child With Hunky Boy Toy

author: Radar Staff
title: Baby One More Time? Britney Spears ‘Desperate’ For Child With Hunky Boy Toy
text:
Britney Spears and her hunky 22-year-old boyfriend, Sam Asghari , have been dating only three months but RadarOnline.com has exclusively learned that she wants to have his baby as soon as possible !
The 35-year-old “Baby One More Time” singer – whose longtime running “Piece of Me” Las Vegas residency is coming to an end – hasn’t been so lucky in the relationship department in recent years.
PHOTOS: Britney Spears’ New Man EXPOSED! Inside His Shocking High School Secret 
But a source close to the pop princess, who just recently confirmed she and Asgari were officially an item, has revealed to Radar, “Britney is telling her friends that she really wants Sam to be the one to give her another child. She says she has never been so in love!”
Since meeting Asghari on the set of her “Slumber Party” video, the mother of Jayden , 10, and Sean Preston , 11, has been flaunting her sexy body all over Instagram. According to the insider, it is all part of her master plan!
“Britney is doing everything she can to keep her youth because she knows that Sam is much, much younger than her and she will do anything to make this work.”
Overprotected! Britney Spears’ Dad ‘Hates’ Her New Model Boyfriend! 
As Radar previously reported , however, Spears’ dad, Jamie – who still has legal conservatorship over his daugther – is simply not a Sam fan!
“Her family and friends don’t really trust him,” said the source, “especially because they are already talking marriage and kids!”
Do you think that Britney should have a baby with Sam? Tell us your thoughts below.
We pay for juicy info! Do you have a story for RadarOnline.com? Email us at tips@radaronline.com, or call us at (866) ON-RADAR (667-2327) any time, day or night.
